signal.name: MmPropertiesChanged
signal.tp:docstring: One or more properties' values changed.

arg.name: interface
arg.tp:docstring: The D-Bus interface of the changed properties.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: The changed property names and their new values.

signal.name: PropertiesChanged
signal.tp:docstring: One or more properties value changed; this signal implements the D-Bus specification's PropertiesChanged signal.

arg.name: interface
arg.tp:docstring: The D-Bus interface of the changed properties.

arg.name: changed_properties
arg.tp:docstring: The changed property names and their new values.

arg.name: invalidated_properties
arg.tp:docstring: Properties which are now invalid, but for which the new value is not emitted in this signal. Clients interested in these properties should issue a Get request for them to retrieve the new value.
